About this export_views package

This package provides some views that can be used to export some package data to another format. Currently supported formats are

  • SMIL : a basic SMIL rendering of annotations. It can be applied to a package.
  • SRT subtitles : subtitles in the SRT format (used by some video players).
  • SVG : all annotations on a timeline, in a graphical representation
  • spreadsheet : a tab-separated-value conversion.

You can either import the export_views package (through the Edit/Package imports menu), or copy/paste the contents of a view into one of your own views, to adapt if better to your needs.
